recipe.title: Elderflower Cooler
ingredients: 1 1/2 quarts chilled sparkling mineral water or seltzer
1/4 cup elderflower concentrate*, or to taste
*available at some specialty foods shops and by mail order from Dean & DeLuca, tel. (800) 221-7714 or (212) 431-1691
instructions: Thinly slice lemons and limes and crush mint. In a pitcher stir together lemons, limes, mint, and remaining ingredients. Serve cooler over ice in tall glasses.
